channel.title: Homes on Jiangang Shu
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Jiangang Shu

item.description: I am currently a Research Scientist in Cyberspace Security Research Center, Peng Cheng Laboratory, Shenzhen, China. I obtained Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from City University of Hong Kong (CityU) in Feb., 2019., M.Eng. degree in Computer Science and Technology, and B.Eng. degree in Network Technology and Engineering from Nanjing University of Information Science & Technology in 2015 and 2012, respectively. From Feb. 2018 to Aug. 2018, I was a postgraduate visiting student in Secure Mobile Centre at Singapore Management University, supervised by Prof.
